definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Plum green glaze is a outstanding celadon glaze originated in Longquan Kiln in Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 梅子青是南宋龙泉窑创制的杰出青釉品种。

sentences.english: He whiffed 10 Mets in a game last June 17 at Yankee Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 去年他在洋基球场上三振掉了10颗梅子。

sentences.english: Mash pickled plums, mix well with remaining seasoning and chopped ginger.
sentences.chinese: 压烂梅子，拌入其馀酸梅汁材料及姜茸。

sentences.english: An apple, a pear, a plum or a cherry.
A feminine berry that's not too dramatic for fair skin.
sentences.chinese: 女人味十足的梅子色对于浅色皮肤来说也不夸张。

sentences.english: Persistent blackberries fruits and toasty oak in lingering finish.
sentences.chinese: 持续的黑梅子和烤橡木味令余韵更为悠长。

sentences.english: I also noticed that most of them had ridges.
sentences.chinese: 我也注意到大多数梅子核上都有隆起的狭长垄沟。

sentences.english: This is the plum. And, these bits are in motion.
sentences.chinese: 这就是梅子，这些小块在不停运动之中。

sentences.english: I'd like to have this stewed prunes and omelet, just plain.
sentences.chinese: 我要吃煮干梅子和纯煎蛋卷以及黄油面包。

sentences.english: This dissemination of plum wine aroma.
sentences.chinese: 此酒悠悠散发着梅子香气。

sentences.english: Grandmother's homemade wine was made from plums.
sentences.chinese: 祖母自制的酒是用梅子酿的。

sentences.english: That is a Japanese apricot, which has full of plums.
sentences.chinese: 那是长在断崖边的梅树，树上结满了梅子。

sentences.english: Ripe sub-tropical fruit aromas and flavors of plum, cherry and pepper. Typical style of Carmenere.
sentences.chinese: 散出成熟梅子和樱桃芳香，韵含胡椒辛辣味。

sentences.english: Slivovitz is a potent, eastern European plum brandy.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种浓烈的东欧梅子白兰地。

sentences.english: The plums grown so well, he eats some of the plums.
sentences.chinese: 看到梅子长得正好，就采了一些吃起来。

sentences.english: However plum one day a thin continue, and finally to happen.
sentences.chinese: 但是梅子一天天瘦了下去，终于到了弥留之际。
